function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived threat influencing protective or defensive motivations","Impact":"Inadequate response to contagion risks","Mitigation":"Education on threat severity and efficacy to manage the threat","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, behavioral interventions","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Maladaptive approaches due to low perceived efficacy","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion transmission","Mitigation":"Enhancing perceived efficacy through targeted interventions","Technologies":"Psychosocial interventions, personalized guidance","People":"Individuals with low perceived efficacy","Owner":"Health professionals, psychologists"},{"Description":"Limited response to fear appeals in diverse research contexts","Impact":"Ineffective communication of contagion risks and management strategies","Mitigation":"Tailored messaging for specific contexts, audience segmentation","Technologies":"Data analytics for audience profiling, targeted communication strategies","People":"Researchers, communicators, health promoters","Owner":"Research institutions, communication agencies"}]}
